Title: Global report links loneliness to over 871,000 deaths annually
Summary: A new global report by the World Health Organisation (WHO) has revealed that loneliness is responsible for more than 871,000 deaths each year . This equates to over 100 lives lost every hour . The report highlights the widespread impact of loneliness and loneliness .

Title: Three cattle rustlers arrested in Abia
Summary: Following a tip-off, the Abia State security outfit, Operation Crush, apprehended three cattle rustlers in Onhiya community in Umuahia South Local Government Area . Navy Commander Macdonald Uba (retd.) said, the arrest was because of the swift action of Operation Crush .

Title: UK GDP records fastest growth in Q1 2025
Summary: The economy expanded by 0.7 percent between January and March, the strongest quarterly growth since early 2024 . The strong first quarter was driven in part by a rush of property transactions before the March 31 expiration of a homebuyer tax break . The Bank of England projects a more modest 0.25 percent growth for the second quarter .
